snippet.textDisplay: It can be hard to understand where the music is going if you don't follow the rhythm. But if you add the drums in, it's easier to understand the music and its rhythm.

snippet.textDisplay:
This was the best Mario game. (Sorry Mario 3 fans.)

While I love that Nintendo's made some new platform Mario games these past few years (about time!), it's like they gave up on good music. It's crappy wii-sounding music. I want fun Mario music!!
snippet.textOriginal:
This was the best Mario game. (Sorry Mario 3 fans.)

While I love that Nintendo's made some new platform Mario games these past few years (about time!), it's like they gave up on good music. It's crappy wii-sounding music. I want fun Mario music!!
